column4: hi guys i have a question about connecting to my wireless network
i am using the Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 2200BG network card
and i am not able to connect  to my router
anyone to help with wireless networking?
its a home network with a WPA shared key
what part of wifi (wireless networking) u need help with
Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 2200BG  wireless network card i am using...
i am not able to connect  wireless  though ethernet works
it does not connect even though it says the wireless network active
- does it ask for a key to connect and can it see the beacon from your router?
yes i can see the SSID of my network and other networks nearby
do i need to install WPA applicant?
that could be - when I connected my Atheroes nic i did not see an option for WPA, so I just used WEP since it was supported out of the box - it's nice when things just work with minimal effort
I had to leave for awhile - did you get into your router?
